minutes to he -> watched : 1
to he watched -> her : 1
he watched her -> walk : 1
watched her walk -> away : 1
her walk away -> along : 1
walk away along -> the : 1
away along the -> her : 1
along the her -> gray : 1
the her gray -> cloak : 1
her gray cloak -> billowing : 1
gray cloak billowing -> slightly : 1
cloak billowing slightly -> around : 1
billowing slightly around -> the : 1
slightly around the -> carpetbag : 1
around the carpetbag -> she : 1
the carpetbag she -> her : 1
carpetbag she her -> red : 1
she her red -> hair : 1
her red hair -> screwed : 1
red hair screwed -> tightly : 1
hair screwed tightly -> up : 1
screwed tightly up -> under : 1
tightly up under -> her : 1
under her cap -> and : 1
her cap and -> already : 1
cap and already -> working : 1
and already working -> itself : 1
already working itself -> loose : 1
working itself loose -> from : 1
itself loose from -> its : 1
loose from its -> pins : 1
from its pins -> most : 1
its pins most -> beautiful : 1
pins most beautiful -> woman : 1
most beautiful woman -> in : 1
beautiful woman in -> the : 1
the the flame -> that : 1
flame that had -> warmed : 1
that had warmed -> his : 1
had warmed his -> heart : 1
warmed his heart -> back : 1
his heart back -> to : 1
heart back to -> from : 1
back to from -> beneath : 1
to from beneath -> the : 1
beneath the cold -> ash : 1
the cold ash -> that : 1
cold ash that -> the : 1
ash that the -> department : 1
that the department -> had : 1
department had left -> of : 1
had left of -> with : 1
left of with -> lucid : 1
of with lucid -> certainty : 1
with lucid certainty -> he : 1
lucid certainty he -> knew : 1
certainty he knew -> that : 1
knew that she -> was : 1
was the reason -> he : 1
reason he turned -> into : 1
he turned into -> pritchard : 1
turned into pritchard -> grippen : 1
into pritchard grippen -> had : 1
pritchard grippen had -> was : 1
grippen had was -> the : 1
had was the -> she : 1
was the she -> disappeared : 1
the she disappeared -> into : 1
she disappeared into -> the : 1
the darkness outside -> the : 1
darkness outside the -> he : 1
outside the he -> thought : 1
the he thought -> he : 1
thought he saw -> a : 1
he saw a -> slim : 1
saw a slim -> figure : 1
a slim figure -> in : 1
slim figure in -> a : 1
figure in a -> british : 1
in a british -> uniform : 1
a british uniform -> a : 1
british uniform a -> flicker : 1
uniform a flicker -> of : 1
flicker of pale -> hair : 1
of pale hair -> like : 1
pale hair like -> cobwebs : 1
hair like cobwebs -> follow : 1
like cobwebs follow -> her : 1
cobwebs follow her -> into : 1
follow her into -> the : 1
